DOC.brief_summary: Prenatal care define preventive healthcare characterize regular check-ups doctor midwives treat prevent potential health problem throughout course pregnancy . The investigator propose mobile app prenatal care potential provide patient-tailored , risk-appropriate prenatal educational content may facilitate vital sign weight check visit . The investigator describe method use develop test effectiveness mobile app prenatal care safely reduce number in-person visit obstetrician ( OB ) compare standard care .
DOC.brief_title: Mobile App Prenatal Care Reduce Visits Improve Satisfaction Study
DOC.detailed_description: This protocol multi-center quasi-randomized control trial compare intervention group receive prenatal care app , control group receive usual care . The trial conduct two diverse outpatient obstetric practice part single academic department obstetrics Washington , DC . Women 18 40 , visit OB first trimester routine visit , confirm desired pregnancy , consider `` high-risk , '' IOS , Android Windows-based smart phone use regularly eligible enrollment . The Investigators measure effect mobile app prenatal care : 1. number in-person OB visit pregnancy ; 2. patient satisfaction prenatal care ; 3. gestational weight gain ; 4. maternal fetal outcome ; 5. clinician satisfaction . To capture outcome , investigator administer patient survey via telephone every 4 week gestation immediate post-partum period , review electronic medical record , conduct in-depth interview representative subset patient delivery .
DOC.criteria: Eligible participant woman 18 40yearsold , visit OB firsttrimester verification pregnancy visit , new OB visit followup OB visit , lowrisk per treat OB , regularly use smartphone , understand consent Englishwritten consent form . Eligible clinician attend obstetric physician refer patient research assistant inform consent full eligibility assessment .
